subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Rusney Castillo, 27, agreed to a deal with Boston, joining Yoenis Cespedes, another outfielder from Cuba who joined the Red Sox less than a month ago.
snippet: Rusney Castillo, 27, agreed to a deal with Boston, joining Yoenis Cespedes, another outfielder from Cuba who joined the Red Sox less than a month ago.
